WRITING.TITLE: ELI5: in an economy of extreme wealth gap... many middle class and very few rich, would the price of exotic cars drop?
In countries with extreme wealth gaps, the only vehicles on the roads are Bentleys and bicycles. If one of their poor came here, they would have unreasonable expectations for what you drove.
